mean_cn: n.改革运动，十字军东侵；  v.加入十字军，从事改革运动
mean_en: any one of the wars that European Christian countries fought against Muslims in Palestine in the 11th, 12th, and 13th centuries
sentence: In the Middle Ages, European Christians went on crusades against the Muslims in Palestine.
sentence_trans: 在中世纪，欧洲基督教徒发动十字军东征来对抗巴勒斯坦地区穆斯林。
word_etyma: crus十字 + ade名词后缀 → crusade 十字军东征，改革运动
